name: Interstellar Armageddon
description:
In 2090 the earth 🌎 got immensely overpopulated and the arising pandemics led to the downfall of the planet. A settlement 'Asana' was established in the space by IASA and the inhabitants of the Earth were shipped to Asana.

As we thought that our planet was at a downfall, it wasn't just us. Aliens👽 from Z145 galaxy were in search for a home too. Our only chance of survival and existence is to fight back the aliens from Ragathor.
We need you to make things right, so get aboard now!!🚀🛸

Why you would like it:

If you are a fan of arcade shooting games like Galactica and Galaxia you are surely going to enjoy Interstellar Armageddon. You will come across various enemies with different powers and you would have to come up with different tactics and use various ammunition in order to survive and get along through the multiple levels. After every 5 levels you would be facing a Boss ship. After you defeat a boss you would be rewarded immensely and the difficulty of the game increases

Features:

Multiple ships that you can choose from, once you earn them after finishing new levels.

Challenging campaign multiple levels to solve by killing different alien invader ships and by defeating the boss ships.

Power-ups and Ammunition you earn gem shards from which you can purchase various power-ups and Ammunition which can help you to improvise in defeating the enemies using different strategies.

How to play:

* Slide to control your spaceship dodge enemy's bullets and shot them.
* Use gem shards to upgrade or evolve your spaceship to fight with giant enemies and alien invaders.
* Use appropriate spaceships and strategies for each level and boss.
* Remember using power-up item, booster item to level up easier.

DON'T MISS OUT YOUR ONLY CHANCE TO SAVE ASANA AND OUR ONLY CHANCE OF SURVIVAL!
